items.name: Remix
items.description: A web-based IDE for developing smart contracts.

items.name: ChainIDE
items.description: A cloud-based multi-chain IDE.

items.name: Hardhat
items.description: A development environment focused on flexibility and performance.

items.name: Scaffold-ETH 2
items.description: Open source forkable Ethereum dev stack.

items.name: Foundry
items.description: Manages your dependencies, compiles your project, runs tests, and deploys.

items.description: A JavaScript library for interacting with Ethereum nodes.

items.description: A modern, flexible JavaScript library for interacting with Ethereum.

items.description: A Python library for interacting with Ethereum nodes.

items.name: Wagmi
items.description: Wagmi Core is a VanillaJS library for Ethereum.

description: Explore Ethereum transactions and smart contracts.

items.name: Etherscan
items.description: A popular Ethereum blockchain explorer with a wealth of tools and data.

items.name: Blockscout
items.description: Open-source, universally accessible, and fully customizable.

items.name: Otterscan
items.description: A blazingly fast, local, Ethereum block explorer built on top of Erigon.

items.name: Blockchair
items.description: Blockchain explorer, analytics and web services.

items.name: Beaconcha.in
items.description: Open-source Ethereum explorer.

items.name: Blobscan
items.description: The first EIP4844 Blob Transaction explorer.

items.name: EIP-7503
items.description: Enables anonymous ETH transfers using zero-knowledge proofs without third-party mixers.

items.name: EIP-627
items.description: Specifies Whisper protocol for encrypted, peer-to-peer messaging.

items.name: EIP-600
items.description: Defines purpose-based HD wallet paths for better identity separation.

items.name: EIP-601
items.description: Outlines a structured hierarchy for Ethereum HD wallets to improve privacy.

items.name: EIP-1344
items.description: Adds chain ID to prevent cross-chain transaction replays.

items.name: ERC-2334
items.description: Introduces HD wallet structure for Ethereum 2.0 using BLS keys.

items.name: ERC-2386
items.description: Proposes a format for securely storing Ethereum 2.0 wallet definitions.

description: Software security with tools designed to protect against privacy threats and vulnerabilities.

items.name: Apeworx
items.description: Dev tools for smart contract engineers and data scientists.

items.name: Slither
items.description: A Solidity and Vyper static analysis framework written in Python 3.

items.name: Cyfrin
items.description: Rust-based Solidity AST analyzer.

items.name: TOSINT
items.description: Telegram OSINT tool to extract information from Telegram Bots and Channels.

items.description: A curated list of awesome things related to open-source intelligence.

items.name: Awesome Onchain Investigation Handbook
items.description: A curated list of onchain investigation tools.

items.description: A curated list of awesome things related to learning ZKP.

items.name: LibStark
items.description: A library for ZK scalable transparent argument of knowledge.

items.name: EthSnarks
items.description: Toolkit for developing Ethereum compatible smart contracts which use zero-knowledge proofs.

items.description: A curated list of amazing Homomorphic Encryption libraries, software and resources.

items.description: Sample code and build environments for multi-party computation frameworks.

items.description: The core library of differential privacy algorithms powering the OpenDP Project.

items.description: A system of mentorship with aim to train leaders and raise people up.

items.description: Hypermedia and file sharing peer-to-peer network for storing and sharing data in a distributed file system.

items.name: Bittorrent
items.description: Communication protocol for p2p file sharing.

items.name: Swarm
items.description: Decentralised data storage and distribution technology.

items.name: Codex
items.description: Durable, decentralised data storage protocol.

description: Communication through secure VPNs and network privacy tools.

items.name: Mullvad
items.description: Bridge protocol for censorship circumvention.

items.name: Geph
items.description: Offers zero-knowledge privacy, anti-censorship resilience, and free access to all.

items.name: NymVPN
items.description: New Mixnet decentralized VPN that offers the best privacy and security.

items.name: WireGuard
items.description: Communication protocol and free and open-source software that implements encrypted virtual private networks.

items.name: OpenVPN
items.description: Virtual private network system that creates secure point-to-point or site-to-site connections in routed or bridged configurations and remote access facilities.

description: Web and search privately with tools that prevent tracking and data exposure.

items.name: Tor
items.description: Proprietary web browser disguises your IP address and activity by relaying it through a network of servers (nodes) run by volunteers.

items.name: Duckduckgo
items.description: Privacy-focused search engine and browser.

items.name: Brave
items.description: Chromium-based browser that blocks ads, fingerprinting, and ad trackers by default.

items.name: Mullvad
items.description: Emulates the Tor network by creating a similar fingerprint for all users, improving anonymity.

description: Anonymous and secure reporting with privacy-centric whistleblowing platforms.

items.name: GlobaLeaks
items.description: Set up a secure and anonymous whistleblowing initiative.

items.name: Wikileaks
items.description: Publishes confidential and classified information from various sources.

items.name: TailsOS
items.description: Security-focused Debian-based Linux distribution aimed at preserving privacy and anonymity against surveillance.
